courses.title: Introduction to Web Development
courses.description: A beginner-friendly course covering the basics of HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

courses.title: Advanced HTML and CSS Techniques
courses.description: Take your web design skills to the next level with advanced HTML5 and CSS3 concepts.

courses.title: JavaScript Fundamentals
courses.description: Learn the fundamentals of JavaScript programming, including DOM manipulation and event handling.

courses.title: Responsive Web Design
courses.description: Master the principles of responsive design and create websites that work seamlessly across all devices.

courses.title: Full Stack Web Development
courses.description: Comprehensive course covering both front-end and back-end web development technologies like React, Node.js, and MongoDB.

courses.title: CSS Grid Layout
courses.description: Explore the power of CSS Grid Layout and learn how to create complex layouts with ease.

courses.title: Front-end Frameworks: React
courses.description: Dive deep into React.js and build interactive user interfaces for your web applications.

courses.title: Back-end Development with Node.js
courses.description: Learn to build scalable and efficient back-end systems using Node.js and Express.

courses.title: Database Design and Management
courses.description: Master the fundamentals of database design and management using SQL and NoSQL databases.

courses.title: Web Security and Ethical Hacking
courses.description: Protect your web applications from cyber threats and learn ethical hacking techniques.
